Class Report

java.lang.Object
model.Report
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Hardware, Software
public abstract class Report extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract class that represents a report of an electronic device. This is the base class for different types of reports such as hardware and software.
See Also:

    • getReportInfo

      public abstract String getReportInfo()
      Abstract method to get the report information as a formatted string. Each concrete report type will implement this method according to its specific attributes.
      Returns:
      A string with the formatted report information
